solution_line_template: Kaiden collects {first_week} cans his first week and {second_week} cans during the second week. {first_week} + {second_week} = <<{first_week}+{second_week}={total_collected}>>{total_collected} cans of soup
Kaiden wants to collect a total of {goal} cans, so he still needs {goal} - {total_collected} = <<{goal}-{total_collected}={cans_needed}>>{cans_needed} cans of soup
